name: Findery Notes
author: Findery

sections.description:
Findery

Findery is all about places.

From local lore to travel stories, share the places you love, learn more about your favorite places and the places you’ve always wanted to visit.

Usage:

  • Go to Appearance > Widgets.
  • Drag “Findery Notes” to the sidebar or other area where you want it to display.
  • Change the Findery username to your username. If you don’t already have an account, go to Findery to
    register.
  • [Optional] Change the embed layout as either List or Photo Grid.
  • [Optional] Change the width and height if desired.
  • [Optional] Add custom CSS styles. (Default: None)
  • [Optional] Show a frame border. (Default: Off)
  • [Optional] Display scroll bars. (Default: On)
  • Click “Save”
sections.installation:
1. Upload findery_notes_widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. See instructions above for how to use the widget.
